name: Shroomed!
description:
Shroomed is a strategy game.  Conquer the world as you control mushrooms and kill many mages as you can. Unleash their powers using cards and survive the endless waves of mages. Discover many mushrooms and use them strategically. Face different mages and enemies as you progress. Gain coins and stars by completing the missions in every level.

Disclaimer:

This game is still in development. However, the developer accepts ideas and suggestions that will benefit the game. Thanks.
